p: As depicted in Figure 4A, incubation of harpagide 5-O-β-D-glucopyranoside with neutrophils significantly ( p < 0.05) inhibited ROS production stimulated by zymosan in PMNs with an IC 50 value of 0.33 + 0.01 µg/mL. The activity was dose dependent with increasing concentration. The compound also significantly ( p < 0.05) suppressed the proliferation of T-cell proliferation, with a 26% inhibitory activity compared to the control as shown in Figure 4B.
